---

<h3 align="center">Show Hidden Channels</h3>

<p align="center">Displays all hidden channels which can't be accessed, this won't allow you to read them.</p>

---

### "Performance" branch features
- Shows hidden channels in servers.
- A splash screen indicating you cannot see that channel with the channel topic under it if it exists
- The ability to see people live as they join & leave in hidden voice channels
- Lock indicator to distinguish a locked channel from a normal one

### "Features" branch features

- Shows hidden channels in servers.
- A splash screen indicating you cannot see that channel with the channel topic under it if it exists
- Customizable per-server blacklist
- The ability to turn off certain channel types from showing
- The choice of having a category called 'Hidden' at the bottom of the server with the hidden channels or having them show as normal
- The ability to see people live as they join & leave in hidden voice channels
- Lock indicator to distinguish a locked channel from a normal one
